UNIVERSITY BROADCASTING SERVICES
January 29, 1958
Dr* Sam Becker, Chairman
NAEB Research Committee
Television Center
State University of Iowa
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Sam:
Are there any funds available to pay for the costs of issuing certificates
to those *foo participated in the recent NAEB Research Seminar* In our own
operations I believe that they have an important place* Of importance, too,
I believe that it might be a nice way to thank all of the people who put
themselves out for the conference*
Cordially,
Raymond D. Cheydleur
Assistant Director
c*c* Harry Skoraia
